doc.title: Hijos del cante
doc.plot: A documentary on the new generation of young flamenco artists. Antonio Rayo, 'Rayito', one of the best flamenco guitar players in the world. Omayra, granddaughter of the mythic Carmen Amaya, lives in New Mexico where she teaches flamenco at the University. Dorantes, nephew of 'El Lebrijano', a 25 years old that has made possible, through his piano, that flamenco chords reach all the world, and Josemi Carmona, flamenco group Ketama singer, a young flamenco artist that is already succeeding in the international market.
